speaker: Viral image
vclaim: == sync, corrected by elderman == @elder_man They're 12 hours ahead, so we'll have plenty of time to drop their missiles!"
date: stated on March 7, 2019 in a Facebook post:
title: No, Alexandria Okasio Cortez didn't say we had time to drop Chinese missiles.
text: Depending on who you ask, the concern about the cold war with China is justified or exaggerated. While today there may be more chatter about cyber attacks than nuclear bombs, we should be safe from airborne weapons - at least according to Facebook about the U.S. Republic of Alexandria - Cortez. "We will never worry about China attacking us!" reads the text on the photo of the New York Congresswoman posted on Facebook on March 7. "We have 12 hours, so we'll have plenty of time to drop their missiles!" One of the commentators asked, "How could anyone be so stupid?" "Who are you supporting?" Another commentator said. "Every time she opens her mouth, she eases all doubt." This article was referred to as part of Facebook's efforts to combat false news and misleading information in its news broadcast. ∙ (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) A spokesman for Okasio-Cortez said that the quote was fabricated. On January 13, 2021, the distinguished fact-checkers announced in a story in which General David H. Berger, commander of the United States Navy, rejected Nancy Belusi's request to use the Marines to install security, saying, "We're not working for you." By Samantha Butterman, on January 17, 2021, we couldn't find any credible evidence that she said that. First, we sought to quote Google; there were few results. A user quoted Okasio Cortez participated in the arms owners ' forum in Mississippi, although without a source, and someone else posted it on the pilot production, another online forum. It also appeared on web sites with a Ukrainian Internet address. We looked for Nexus for the old news with Okasio Cortez, who made the statement and came out empty. Nor have we been able to find reports of anyone saying that. After that, we looked for social media releases and news reports on the Chinese Congresswoman and missiles, if she said something similar to the quote, but we did not find examples of the Ocacio Cortez discussion. In September, a spokesperson for her campaign told Facheck.org that "the entire quote was fabricated." "We haven't even discussed Chinese missiles. "The spokesman for Corbin Trent said. "The subjects of its foreign policy were peace, not war." We're assessing this position with pants on fire! Sharing the facts of 2019-03-13 16:52 UTC Politic Fact 1 1 7 PoliticFact Rating: Pants on Fire Ascandria Ocasio-Cortez said: "We will never worry about China attacking us! They're 12 hours ahead, so we'll have plenty of time to drop their missiles!" The viral image on the Internet is Thursday, 7 March 2019 2019-03-07. Read more information.
